name: Mycelia (lewisgads02, MagicalMale)
description:
Mycelia is a narrative driven, first-person puzzle game inspired by Half Life, Portal and Firewatch.

Mycelia's narrative experience is world-focused and based on environmental storytelling. The player is rewarded for seeking out lost pieces of the world before it was overtaken by a strange fungal eco-system.

Physics based puzzles challenge the player to use the unique tools that they find in creative ways.
